review.comment_positive: This has to be the most peaceful yet quirky place I've stayed in.  It is remote but there are many things to do.  The owner is very friendly and will do anything to make your stay comfortable.  It may not be the easiest to get to but one of the staff members came to meet our taxi driver at a market in the closest town to lead him back to the farm.  If you are looking for peace and serenity then this is your place to stay.

review.rating: The staff are all really friendly would definitely recommend.
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and in a lovely location. Perfect for backpackers.
review.comment_negative: The food served is all traditional Vietnamâ€™s meals.

review.comment_positive: close too Cu Chi tunnel, a secret nature corner.
Friendly staff, lovely relaxing location.

review.rating: I wouldn't change anything about this location. The people and the food and the area is simple amazi
review.comment_positive: Having spent 14 hours on a sleeper bus we got a grab from the city to Las Farmstay. Within an hour upon arrival we were upgraded to this beautiful hut by the lily lakes. The staff were so so friendly,allowed us to use the scooter to pop tot the shop and the push bikes to ride to the tunnels. They cooked our breakfast upon request as 1 day I was poorly and didn't eat till the evening. The food was amazing and i believe they grow alot themsleves. Very remote with only the sound of crickets,lizards and fish as our company in the evenings. The pool is clean and during the day was a fantastic place to rest. Cheap beers,peaceful evenings and wouldn't have changed ANYTHING about the place or the staff. 100% would go back. My only advice is take cash. I didn't and i regret this.
review.comment_negative: I loved everything and I am so glad I found this place to stay. Especially as its so close to the tunnels which is a must for anyone visiting the area.

review.comment_positive: The staff were very kind.  The location is serene.  The room was comfy and clean.  The AC worked great.  The food was delicious and plentiful.

A great place to stay. Quiet and 'out of the way' 
Very Friendly staff, some spoke good English. 
V good food. 
Accommodation was quirky and private. I really liked our bungalow. 
Pool was clean. 
Self service bar, based on trust. pool and bar football. 
Perfect for us as we were motorcycling and, were heading for a Cu Chi tunnels tour nearby, in the morning. 
Great if you want a chilled stay in the countryside
review.comment_negative:
We liked it all!! 
Maybe shower a bit basic BUT very minor detail!

review.rating: I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a relaxing and memorable vacation.
review.comment_positive: Its absolutely. The staff was incredibly welcoming and accommodating, the room was spacious and clean. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient place to stay.
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.comment_positive: very grÃ¼nkohl people and very taste food

review.rating: Perfect nature get away with the kindest hosts. We loved it
review.comment_positive: Beautiful farm surrounded by nature , lovely hosts always willing to help and so kind
Warm staff. Everybody is very helpfull

We loved our stay here. Such a beautiful location with lots of space. The kids loved helping collect fruit from the farm and all the animals and wildlife. They also loved fishing. The pool is great. Get gorgeous views of sunset from rooftop..our room was spacious and really quirky building which we loved. All the staff were very friendly and the food was fantastic

review.rating: Frindley stay in the middle of nowhere!
review.comment_positive: This farmstay is really totally out in the countryside. You can have a walk or borrow a bicycle to get around and experience the ricefields and farms. We had a fantastic dinner with vegetables from the farm. The poolarea is very nice. We had one of the deluxe cottages with AC. It was clean but basic. Come here to get some air when you have been to long in the busy HCM ğŸ˜Š Not very good at Englisch, but very  helpful.
review.comment_negative: That we only stayed one night.

review.rating: I had a blast at LA'S FARMSTAY, where the environment is cute, and the hosts are cuter!
review.comment_positive:
Thanks for making my trip so fun and I had such a blast staying at your farm. The scenery was awesome and the food was yummy. You guys rock! Mr. TÃ¢m, Mr. TÆ°á»ng, Mr. SÃ³i and Ms. Trang have been super nice and helpful. Mr. Phong your place was cozy and clean. I can't wait to come back to more stay with you guys.

Excellent hospitality.

review.rating: A great place for people who want to experience the beautiful scenery and warnings fretting of the country side in Vietn
review.comment_positive: Good service, friendly people.
review.comment_negative: No.

review.comment_positive:
Swimming pool 
People very nice

review.rating: I think here is the best resort in Tay Ninh province if you want to experience the country side life
review.comment_positive: Nice local breakfast.
review.comment_negative: no.

review.comment_positive: Great hospitality of the whole staff and an absolutely lovely cottage with a beautiful view out on the green ricefields. The location is perfect for a short getaway from HCMC and it's not expensive at all. I can highly recommend this place to anyone longing to breathe in some fresh countryside air and to eat some very fresh fruit and vegetables straight from the land. The food will be brought to your cottage or you can enjoy it at the restaurant. I really feel re-energized after my stay here.

review.rating: So great,came back for another stay!
review.comment_positive: Great location close to the city to escape for a long weekend. Plenty of birds and greenery to enjoy.
review.comment_negative: The kitchen does not have much equipment to eat with or cook. Very limited.

review.rating: good place for short break on weekend.
review.comment_positive: owner n staff are friendly.
review.comment_negative: nothing
It was nothing special, quite boring actually. It is in the middle of nowhere. If you don't tell them in advance that you want to eat there, they can just cook some noodles for you.

review.rating: Oase van rust en mooie natuur, mÃ©t zwembad!
review.comment_positive: Wat een prachtig mooie plek is dit! Lekker afgelegen, maar je hebt daar alles wat je nodig hebt. Heerlijk zwembad en allemaal leuke hutjes waar je in kan slapen! Ook zijn de mensen super vriendelijk en helpen ze je met van alles. Vanuit de goedheid van hun hart en vanuit vertrouwen, want we mochten bijvoorbeeld gratis een scooter lenen. Echt een hele fijne sfeer.
review.comment_negative: Het bed in de bungalow was wat hard. Je sliep op pallets met een iets te dun matras erop. Maar voor een (paar) nachtjes kan het prima. De beleving die je daar hebt telt veel meer mee!

review.comment_positive: Ondanks dat ze geen engels spraken waren ze heel gastvriendelijk, goed ontbijt, goeie faciliteiten in een prachtige omgeving!

review.comment_negative: Verwacht geen Westers eten of accommodatie. Het is wat het is maar voldoende om leuke dagen te hebben.

review.comment_positive: We hebben deze biologische boerderij uitgezocht door de ligging ten opzichte van de Cu Chi tunnels. De boerderij ligt in niemandsland maar is werkelijk van alle gemakken voorzien. Biljart, zwembad, heerlijk eten etc.

Ein wunderschÃ¶ner Ort an einer ruhigen Lage, mit vielen Teichen und von viel GrÃ¼n umgeben. Die Gastgeber sind sehr freundlich, das Essen war super lecker, der Pool war sauber und mit perfekter Aussicht auf den Sonnenuntergang. WÃ¤re gerne lÃ¤nger geblieben.

Le personnel est vraiment adorable, gentil et trÃ¨s serviable, se soucie du bien Ãªtre des clients. 
Super piscine, trÃ¨s beau cadre, bonne cuisine.
Het zwembad en de mensen
